## AWSBuckets.blockPublicAccess() method

Block or unblock public access

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
blockPublicAccess(bucketName: string, blockAccess: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bucketName | string | Bucket name |
|  blockAccess | boolean | true if you want to block public access, false otherwise |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
